name: first reply
description: Sirius, a.k.a. Martti Malmi, was the second Bitcoin developer after Satoshi and the founder of the Bitcoin Forum. His profile name displayed Sirius, with a picture of an orange cat. This coin is about the first animal EVER in crypto. Sirius Sirius gave the first reply on the bitcoin forum back in 2010. This coin is simply made to honour the cat and person who helped build this industry Sirius also exchanged emails with satoshi
